class.name: NavigationMeshArea3D
class.brief_description: An area shape to affect navigation mesh geometry and properties (when baked).
class.description: An area shape to affect navigation mesh geometry and properties (when baked).

method.name: get_bounds
method.description: Returns the axis-aligned bounding box for the area's transformed shape.

method.name: get_navigation_layer_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member navigation_layers] bitmask is enabled, given a [param layer_number] between 1 and 32.

method.name: set_navigation_layer_value
method.description: Based on [param value], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member navigation_layers] bitmask, given a [param layer_number] between 1 and 32.

members.member: Determines if the [NavigationMeshArea3D] is enabled or disabled. Requires a navigation mesh rebake to take any real effect.
Sets how much the projected area shape is extruded along the positive y-axis starting from its global position.

A bitfield determining all navigation layers the area applies to its affecting polygons. If multiple areas overlap for the same polygons the area with the highest [member priority] wins. These navigation layers can be checked upon when doing path queries with [method NavigationServer3D.query_path] using a [NavigationPathQueryParameters3D] object.
The priority of the area. If multiple areas overlap for the same polygons the area with the highest [member priority] wins.
